"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/553490606368721582fd2f00#post_553490606368721582fd2f00
First youll need a sketchpad and pencil.

Now when drawing that face, make sure its really symetrical, even when perspective calls for it not to be. Gotta add that perfectly round ear too. Now just slap some cartoon colors on and voila!

!http://fc06.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2012/298/5/e/caliborn_art_by_hipsternerd-d5iw48o.gif!

Now your doing it the Molestia way!

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5534950c6368722b879d0100#post_5534950c6368722b879d0100
Here's my tip when drawing with pencil and paper.
Never erase.
Just draw light lines in everything over everything. For other people, it might look like scribbles but *you* can see the shapes that you want. Then, you draw with darker lines but still do it like sketch work, but cleaner.
Only after this do you make line art from it.
